attributes.background: The will of the British people is no longer to go ahead with Brexit! You lied to millions and millions of people to get where you are now.. every promise has been broken! The safety of the United Kingdom is in jeopardy due brexit and we fear this will destroy this once great nation!

rejection.details:
The UK has left the EU, so revoking Article 50 would have no legal effect.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552263
